query:
INSERT INTO `course_modules` (`courseId`, `title`, `description`, `sortOrder`, `totalLessons`, `totalDurationMinutes`, `isPreview`) VALUES
-- Path II: Oral Communication Essentials (courseId = 2)
(2, 'Module 1: Conversation Fluency Basics', 'Develop natural conversation flow and common expressions for workplace interactions.', 1, 4, 80, true),
(2, 'Module 2: Professional Vocabulary', 'Master vocabulary for meetings, presentations, and professional discussions.', 2, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 3: Listening Comprehension', 'Improve your ability to understand spoken French in various workplace contexts.', 3, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 4: Speaking with Confidence', 'Build confidence in expressing opinions, asking questions, and participating in discussions.', 4, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 5: Workplace Scenarios', 'Practice real-world scenarios including meetings, phone calls, and presentations.', 5, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 6: Oral Interaction Strategies', 'Learn strategies for effective oral communication and handling difficult situations.', 6, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 7: Mock Oral Assessments', 'Practice with simulated SLE oral assessments and receive feedback.', 7, 4, 80, false),
(2, 'Module 8: Level B Oral Certification Prep', 'Final preparation for Level B oral proficiency certification.', 8, 4, 80, false),

-- Path III: Written Expression Mastery (courseId = 3)
(3, 'Module 1: Grammar Review & Enhancement', 'Comprehensive review of French grammar for professional writing.', 1, 4, 80, true),
(3, 'Module 2: Professional Email Writing', 'Master the art of writing clear, professional emails in French.', 2, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 3: Report Writing Fundamentals', 'Learn to structure and write effective reports for the federal workplace.', 3, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 4: Briefing Notes & Memos', 'Create concise, impactful briefing notes and internal communications.', 4, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 5: Style & Tone', 'Develop appropriate writing style and tone for various professional contexts.', 5, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 6: Editing & Proofreading', 'Learn self-editing techniques and common error correction.', 6, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 7: Written Assessment Practice', 'Practice with simulated SLE written assessments.', 7, 4, 80, false),
(3, 'Module 8: Level B Written Certification Prep', 'Final preparation for Level B written proficiency certification.', 8, 4, 80, false),

-- Path IV: Advanced Oral Proficiency (courseId = 4)
(4, 'Module 1: Advanced Vocabulary & Idioms', 'Master sophisticated vocabulary and idiomatic expressions.', 1, 4, 80, true),
(4, 'Module 2: Complex Discussion Skills', 'Navigate complex discussions with nuance and precision.', 2, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 3: Presentation Excellence', 'Deliver compelling presentations in French at the executive level.', 3, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 4: Negotiation & Persuasion', 'Master the art of negotiation and persuasive communication.', 4, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 5: Media & Public Speaking', 'Prepare for media interviews and public speaking engagements.', 5, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 6: Cultural Nuances', 'Understand and apply cultural nuances in French communication.', 6, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 7: Advanced Scenario Practice', 'Practice complex workplace scenarios at the executive level.', 7, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 8: Mock Level C Assessments', 'Simulated Level C oral assessments with detailed feedback.', 8, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 9: Stress Management & Performance', 'Techniques for managing stress during high-stakes oral assessments.', 9, 4, 80, false),
(4, 'Module 10: Level C Oral Certification Prep', 'Final intensive preparation for Level C oral certification.', 10, 4, 80, false);
